strapiPost.title: NWA Gives Offers Free Training To Help NWA Nonprofits Maximize Impact
strapiPost.content:
With a vision to see Northwest Arkansas become one of the most generous communities on earth, NWA Gives is hosting free training to prepare nonprofits to make the most of the upcoming NWA Gives Day on Apr 6.

  • Five years strong: Since 2018, NWA Gives has helped 300 participating nonprofits raise almost $3m, enabling them to accomplish their unique missions to serve our region.
  • Training day: Register now to attend a free one-day Intensive training on Feb 21 at Thaden Field, where you can learn from the experts at Branches Mission Lab on how to effectively market, communicate and fundraise for your nonprofit.

Space is limited; sign up for the free training HERE.
